attributes.action: Stop Necular waste dump in blackdyke, Silloth. Cumbria
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to stop the goverment from disposing of nuclar waste in Cumbria. If the proposed site in Black dyke, Silloth is allowed to go ahead it will destroy, not only any trade and visitors to any of the surrounding areas but also according to professor David Smythe "It will leak radioactive contamination within a short time."

Click on link below to see his full report:
http://mariannewildart.wordpress.com/2012/08/15/a-geological-dump-in-cumbria-will-leak-radioactive-contamination-within-a-short-time/

If you care about Cumbria, the uk and any of your family and their generations to come, you must sign this to fight allerdale council from letting the goverment give this the go ahead!
